original_text: When Jesus had finished speaking, a Pharisee invited him to eat with him; so he went in and reclined at the table.
korean_text: 예수께서 말씀하실 때에 한 바리새인이 자기와 함께 점심 잡수시기를 청하므로 들어가 앉으셨더니

sentences.original_text: a Pharisee invited him to eat with him
sentences.korean_translation: 한 바리새인이 그와 함께 식사하라고 초대했다
